keyboard.comment: Niche, the default layout for Catalan should be “es(cat)” (GilForcada)
nowadays official Azeri is written with latin letters
former (times of Soviet Union) the Azeri language was written using Cyrillic, having some special Azeri-Cyrillic letters though

keyboard.description: Asturian (Spain, with bottom-dot H and bottom-dot L)

keyboard.comment: The layout should be the Spanish with middle dot not the “ad” one (GilForcada)
No identified maintainer, and very limited features.
Has been created by the French Linux community to complement fr and allow typing symbols necessary in correct French (added in iso-8859-15, but not present in typewriters or iso-8859-1)

A refresh of fr(latin9) to take unicode changes into account. Please make fr(oss) the default keyboard for French, as it is the most complete and modern. The xkb fr(latin9) is only there for historical purposes. See: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=485137#c0
